name: pedigree
text: Rate this team's core ability to execute the most challenging aspects of this venture, based on the pedigree of the principals

name: critical skills
text: Has this team filled all the critical skills gap required to successfully execute this venture?

name: experience&accomplishments
text: How close does the team's prior experience and accomplishments match the most difficult aspects of this venture?

name: commitment
text: Has the team demonstrated the commitment necessary to see this venture through to success?

name: problem strength
text: Consider this venture’s offering from the vantage of its audience. How strong is the problem, need, or desire being addressed?

name: size of need
text: How many individuals, companies have this need?  How large is the addressable market in your estimate?

name: market growth
text: Is this a market that is growing fast or stagnating/regressing?

name: competition
text: How intense is the competition, either direct or indirect?

name: coverage
text: Has the offering/product been previewed by pundits, social media, reviewers.  How positive / negative is the reaction?

name: market support
text: How much support is this offering having in the market, either from channel partners, or organic marketing, or press?

name: adoption
text: How fast is the addressable market adopting this product/offering?

name: competitor response
text: What is the response from competitors (direct/indirect)?

name: core capabilities
text: Upon review of the solution, product, technology and core science, how transformative is this team’s offering to the market?

name: review credibility
text: Has the technology been reviewed by experts(you or other peers) to validate it?  How credible are the ac?

name: technology risk
text: How risky is this technology/approach?

name: comparitive effectiveness
text: Comparing this offering with existing/upcoming alternatives. How much more effective is it?

name: balance sheet
text: Based on audited financials (if available), how strong is its balance sheet and ability to continually invest?

name: revenue / profit momentum
text: Based on audited financials (if available), how strong is the revenue and marginal profit momentum of the company?\n

name: brand / community support
text: How strong is the goodwill (brand or community support) of the company? How strong is the human capital goodwill of the company?

name: intellectual property
text: How strong is the intellectual property related to the company’s offering and roadmap?  Does it give it a competitive advantage?

name: number of tokens issued
text: Review the schedule of token issuance by the company. Do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be offered for sale?

name: vesting schedule / time-locks
text: Review the schedule of vesting / time-locks on tokens in the ecosystem. Do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be offered for sale?

name: token demand
text: Based on demand by trade/commercial buyers of tokens, do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be purchased?

name: speculative demand
text: Based on demand by speculative/financial buyers of tokens, do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be purchased?

name: bull brief
text: Upon review, can you attest that the Bull valuation brief represents a best-effort, truthful, non-plagiarized, non-conflicted effort by the analyst?

name: bear brief
text: Upon review, can you attest that the Bear valuation brief represents a best-effort, truthful, non-plagiarized, non-conflicted effort by the analyst?

name: jurist recommendation
text: After reviewing the Bull and Bear valuation briefs what is your recommendation?
